com.infinityrefactoring.reflections

Interface ExpressionNode

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayNode, FieldNode, MethodNode

    public interface ExpressionNode
    Represents a node of a path expression.
    Author:
    Thom√°s Sousa Silva (ThomasSousa96)
    See Also:
    PathExpression

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ExpressionNode compile(String expressionNode)
      Compiles the given expression node in an ExpressionNode instance, appropriate for your type.
      String getName()
      Returns the node name.
      Class<?> getNodeClass(Object rootObj, Map<String,Object> args)
      Returns the class that this node will return when applied for the given root object.
      default Object getValue(Object obj)
      Returns the node value.
      Object getValue(Object obj, Map<String,Object> args)
      Returns the node value.
      static boolean isArray(String expressionNode)
      Returns true if the expression node ends with the string "]".
      static boolean isField(String expressionNode)
      Returns true if the expression node is not empty and is not an method or an array.
      static boolean isMethod(String expressionNode)
      Returns true if the expression node ends with the string ")".

      Sets the field value.

      Sets the field value.

    • Method Detail

      • compile

        static ExpressionNode compile(String expressionNode)
        Compiles the given expression node in an ExpressionNode instance, appropriate for your type.
        Parameters:
        expressionNode - the desired expression node
        Returns:
        an compiled instance or null, if the expression node not is a field, method or array
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given expression node is null

      • isArray

        static boolean isArray(String expressionNode)
        Returns true if the expression node ends with the string "]".
        Parameters:
        expressionNode - the desired expression node
        Returns:
        true if is an array

      • isField

        static boolean isField(String expressionNode)
        Returns true if the expression node is not empty and is not an method or an array.
        Parameters:
        expressionNode - the desired expression node
        Returns:
        true if is an field

      • isMethod

        static boolean isMethod(String expressionNode)
        Returns true if the expression node ends with the string ")".
        Parameters:
        expressionNode - the desired expression node
        Returns:
        true if is an method

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the node name.
        Returns:
        the name

      • getNodeClass

        Class<?> getNodeClass(Object rootObj,
                      Map<String,Object> args)
        Returns the class that this node will return when applied for the given root object.
        Parameters:
        rootObj - the object that has this node
        args - the arguments that will be used to access this node.
        Returns:
        the class
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the root object is null

      • getValue

        default Object getValue(Object obj)
        Returns the node value.
        Parameters:
        obj - the instance that will have the node value extracted
        Returns:
        the node value

              Object newValue,
              Map<String,Object> args,
              InstanceFactory instanceFactory)

        Parameters:
        obj - the instance that will have the node value setted.
